Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at an incredible $800,000 by you. We understand its significance and would like to extend to you an exclusive opportunity to own it at a special price. Our offer to you is $750,000. We believe this price reflects the value you see in the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
